snippet: Expect questions for President Obama about the N.S.A. when he stops in Silicon Valley. Also on the Minute, new media censorship from Vladimir V. Putin and a singing nun in Italy becomes a viral sensation.
abstract: Expect questions for President Obama about the N.S.A. when he stops in Silicon Valley. Also on the Minute, new media censorship from Vladimir V. Putin and a singing nun in Italy becomes a viral sensation.

headline.kicker: The New York Times News Minute
